short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter the dark and mysterious world of Batman with striking visuals and seamless shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Explore the dark and iconic world of Gotham City with Batman as the central figure.

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek and mysterious interface inspired by the Dark Knight's legendary style.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date with a bold Gotham-inspired design.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Instantly navigate to your favorite websites with ease.
🎮 Play Games: Access Batman-themed games directly from your shortcuts.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
🚀 More Extension: Add heroic features to enhance your browsing experience with Batman's world.
